Container.Name: fHDHR
Container.Overview: This application is a Python service provides an interface to take various sources of video and make them accessible to client software, such as Plex Media Server (PMS) or Emby by acting like a HDHomerun or an m3u Tuner and an XMLTV provider.

Config.Name: Origin Plugins
Config.Description: Example: locast,plutotv (this is a ', ' separated list plugin names)

Config.Name: Interface Plugins
Config.Description: Example: hdhr (this is a ', ' separated list plugin names)

Config.Name: Stream Plugins
Config.Description: Example: vlc (this is a ', ' separated list plugin names)

Config.Name: EPG Plugins
Config.Description: Example: zap2it (this is a ', ' separated list plugin names)

Container.Description: This application is a Python service provides an interface to take various sources of video and make them accessible to client software, such as Plex Media Server (PMS) or Emby by acting like a HDHomerun or an m3u Tuner and an XMLTV provider.
